mn61:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn61:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma rahulo ambalatthikayam viharati.
mn61:2.2: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena ambalatthika yenayasma rahulo tenupasankami.
mn61:2.3: Addasa kho ayasma rahulo bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
mn61:2.7: Ayasmapi kho rahulo bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn61:3.1: Atha kho bhagava parittam udakavasesam udakadhane thapetva ayasmantam rahulam amantesi:
mn61:3.2: “passasi no tvam, rahula, imam parittam udakavasesam udakadhane thapitan”ti?
mn61:3.4: “Evam parittakam kho, rahula, tesam samannam yesam natthi sampajanamusavade lajja”ti.
mn61:4.1: Atha kho bhagava parittam udakavasesam chaddetva ayasmantam rahulam amantesi:
mn61:4.2: “passasi no tvam, rahula, parittam udakavasesam chadditan”ti?
mn61:4.4: “Evam chadditam kho, rahula, tesam samannam yesam natthi sampajanamusavade lajja”ti.
mn61:5.1: Atha kho bhagava tam udakadhanam nikkujjitva ayasmantam rahulam amantesi:
mn61:5.2: “passasi no tvam, rahula, imam udakadhanam nikkujjitan”ti?
mn61:5.4: “Evam nikkujjitam kho, rahula, tesam samannam yesam natthi sampajanamusavade lajja”ti.
mn61:6.1: Atha kho bhagava tam udakadhanam ukkujjitva ayasmantam rahulam amantesi:
mn61:6.2: “passasi no tvam, rahula, imam udakadhanam rittam tucchan”ti?
mn61:6.4: “Evam rittam tuccham kho, rahula, tesam samannam yesam natthi sampajanamusavade lajjati.
mn61:7.1: Seyyathapi, rahula, ranno nago isadanto urulhava abhijato sangamavacaro sangamagato purimehipi padehi kammam karoti, pacchimehipi padehi kammam karoti, purimenapi kayena kammam karoti, pacchimenapi kayena kammam karoti, sisenapi kammam karoti, kannehipi kammam karoti, dantehipi kammam karoti, nangutthenapi kammam karoti; rakkhateva sondam.
mn61:7.3: ‘ayam kho ranno nago isadanto urulhava abhijato sangamavacaro sangamagato purimehipi padehi kammam karoti, pacchimehipi padehi kammam karoti …pe… nangutthenapi kammam karoti; rakkhateva sondam.
mn61:7.5: Yato kho, rahula, ranno nago isadanto urulhava abhijato sangamavacaro sangamagato purimehipi padehi kammam karoti, pacchimehipi padehi kammam karoti …pe… nangutthenapi kammam karoti, sondayapi kammam karoti, tattha hattharohassa evam hoti:
mn61:7.6: ‘ayam kho ranno nago isadanto urulhava abhijato sangamavacaro sangamagato purimehipi padehi kammam karoti, pacchimehipi padehi kammam karoti, purimenapi kayena kammam karoti, pacchimenapi kayena kammam karoti, sisenapi kammam karoti, kannehipi kammam karoti, dantehipi kammam karoti, nangutthenapi kammam karoti, sondayapi kammam karoti.
mn61:7.8: Natthi dani kinci ranno nagassa akaraniyan’ti.
mn61:7.9: Evameva kho, rahula, yassa kassaci sampajanamusavade natthi lajja, naham tassa kinci papam akaraniyanti vadami.
mn61:7.10: Tasmatiha te, rahula, ‘hassapi na musa bhanissami’ti—
mn61:8.4: “Evameva kho, rahula, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva kayena kammam kattabbam, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva vacaya kammam kattabbam, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva manasa kammam kattabbam.
mn61:9.1: Yadeva tvam, rahula, kayena kammam kattukamo ahosi, tadeva te kayakammam paccavekkhitabbam:
mn61:9.2: ‘yannu kho aham idam kayena kammam kattukamo idam me kayakammam attabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, parabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvatteyya—
mn61:9.4: Sace tvam, rahula, paccavekkhamano evam janeyyasi:
mn61:9.5: ‘yam kho aham idam kayena kammam kattukamo idam me kayakammam attabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, parabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvatteyya—
mn61:9.6: akusalam idam kayakammam dukkhudrayam dukkhavipakan’ti, evarupam te, rahula, kayena kammam sasakkam na karaniyam.
mn61:9.7: Sace pana tvam, rahula, paccavekkhamano evam janeyyasi:
mn61:9.8: ‘yam kho aham idam kayena kammam kattukamo idam me kayakammam nevattabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, na parabyabadhayapi samvatteyya, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvatteyya—
mn61:9.9: kusalam idam kayakammam sukhudrayam sukhavipakan’ti, evarupam te, rahula, kayena kammam karaniyam.
mn61:10.1: Karontenapi te, rahula, kayena kammam tadeva te kayakammam paccavekkhitabbam:
mn61:10.2: ‘yannu kho aham idam kayena kammam karomi idam me kayakammam attabyabadhayapi samvattati, parabyabadhayapi samvattati, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati—
mn61:10.4: Sace pana tvam, rahula, paccavekkhamano evam janeyyasi:
mn61:10.5: ‘yam kho aham idam kayena kammam karomi idam me kayakammam attabyabadhayapi samvattati, parabyabadhayapi samvattati, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati—
mn61:10.6: akusalam idam kayakammam dukkhudrayam dukkhavipakan’ti, patisamhareyyasi tvam, rahula, evarupam kayakammam.
mn61:10.7: Sace pana tvam, rahula, paccavekkhamano evam janeyyasi:
mn61:10.8: ‘yam kho aham idam kayena kammam karomi idam me kayakammam nevattabyabadhayapi samvattati, na parabyabadhayapi samvattati, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati—
mn61:10.9: kusalam idam kayakammam sukhudrayam sukhavipakan’ti, anupadajjeyyasi tvam, rahula, evarupam kayakammam.
mn61:11.1: Katvapi te, rahula, kayena kammam tadeva te kayakammam paccavekkhitabbam:
mn61:11.2: ‘yannu kho aham idam kayena kammam akasim idam me kayakammam attabyabadhayapi samvattati, parabyabadhayapi samvattati, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati—

mn61:11.8: Sace pana tvam, rahula, paccavekkhamano evam janeyyasi:
mn61:11.9: ‘yam kho aham idam kayena kammam akasim idam me kayakammam nevattabyabadhayapi samvattati, na parabyabadhayapi samvattati, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati—

mn61:18.1: Ye hi keci, rahula, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va kayakammam parisodhesum, vacikammam parisodhesum, manokammam parisodhesum, sabbe te evamevam paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva kayakammam parisodhesum, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva vacikammam parisodhesum, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva manokammam parisodhesum.
mn61:18.2: Yepi hi keci, rahula, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va kayakammam parisodhessanti, vacikammam parisodhessanti, manokammam parisodhessanti, sabbe te evamevam paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva kayakammam parisodhessanti, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva vacikammam parisodhessanti, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva manokammam parisodhessan”ti.
mn61:18.3: Yepi hi keci, rahula, etarahi samana va brahmana va kayakammam parisodhenti, vacikammam parisodhenti, manokammam parisodhenti, sabbe te evamevam paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva kayakammam parisodhenti, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva vacikammam parisodhenti, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva manokammam parisodhenti.
mn61:18.4: Tasmatiha, rahula, ‘paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva kayakammam parisodhessami, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva vacikammam parisodhessami, paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva manokammam parisodhessami’ti—
mn61:18.7: Attamano ayasma rahulo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
